body.head: <meta name="author" content="Viktor Tovstyi"> <meta property="og:title" content="${title}"> <meta property="og:image" content="https://machai.machanism.org/bindex-core/images/bindex-logo.png" /> <meta property="og:description" content="Bindex-core delivers essential functionality for bindex metadata management, including generation, registration, library selection, and project assembly. It automates library metadata handling to enable efficient discovery, integration, and assembly workflows within the Machanism ecosystem." /> <meta property="og:image:width" content="250" /> <meta property="og:image:height" content="240" /> <meta property="og:type" content="website" /> <meta property="og:site_name" content="Machai Project" /> <meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" /> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://machai.machanism.org/css/site.css">
